question: Analyze the social media engagement metrics of companies within the technology industry over the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify companies within the technology industry and their corresponding details including name and ID.
Gather the social media engagement data for the identified technology companies from various platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube).
Filter the social media data to only include metrics from the last year such as likes, comments, and engagement rates.
Aggregate the engagement metrics across the different platforms to provide a summary of social media performance for each technology company.
Generate a report that highlights the findings, including which companies have the highest engagement metrics on each platform and overall performance trends.
